entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15 except minus 20 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15 except minus 20 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023
